page.title: 05Religions In Our Area.
page.content: {RELIGIONS IN OUR AREA There are many different churches and religious groups in Norton Radstock.We have the Baptist Chapel,Kingdom Hall, 2 Anglican Churches,4 Methodist Chapels,a Salvation Army Citadel and a Roman Catholic Church.St. John's is the parish church and is about 200yrs. old.There is a statue of King Charles ll.over the door.The catholic church is an ancient tithe barn and is dedicated to the Holy Ghost.It is the only catholic church in our area and has close ties with Downside Abbey.St. Peters,Westfield has never been finished.After it was started there were difficulties with the structure. We have a new Citadel and often a group sings in the High Street.Every Good Friday there is a March of Witness when people visit many of the churches and chapels in the area.
